text: <extra_id_0> BOB.1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> OBF.1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was phosphorylated at Ser184 both in vivo and in vitro , and this modification was required for inducible activation .

text: Mutation of Ser184 also diminished transactivation function in B cells , suggesting that the activating phosphorylation that is inducible in T cells is constitutively present in B cells .

Thus , <extra_id_0> BOB.1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> OBF.1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is a transcriptional coactivator that is critically regulated by posttranslational modifications to mediate cell type - specific gene expression .
